content.txt1: Lomsebenti ungenta imisebenti lefana nemisebenti yemuntfu mbamba kufaka ekhatsi, kepha hhayi kuphela kuchafata, kuvula tinhlelo tekusebenta, njll efonini yakho, futsi ungaphindze uvule letinye ticelo tekukhokha tekukhokha. Ngoba kunebungoti bekubhalwa phansi, kwenta tinkhokhelo, njll, sincoma kakhulu kutsi uyibulale kuphela uma ucondza ngalokuphelele lokucuketfwe ngumbhalo.
content.txt2: Indlela yekuvala lomsebenti: Vula likhasi lasekhaya laloluhlelo, ungayekela kusebentisa umsebenti lositako kumasethingi elikhasi lasekhaya, noma ungachafata inkinobho letsi "Veza yonkhe imisebenti bese uphuma" ekhasini lekucala. Lenkinobho iphocelela kuvalwa kwayo yonkhe imisebenti leyentiwako futsi iphocelele kuvala le-app.
content.txt3: Sizatfu sekutsi sisebentise lomsebenti kutsi luhlelo lwetfu ludzinga kuba nelikhono lekuvula letinye tinhlelo tekusebenta bese tiyatilawula, njengalapho kuphenya i-instagram, kungashelela ngekuzenzakalela ngemuva kwekutsi kudlalwe ividiyo, hlola kutsi umkhicito uyatsengiswa yini, bese utfumela imilayeto kubangani be-inthanethi njalo, njll., lokuyimisebenti lejabulisako noma yekonga umsebenti.
content.title: Imisebenti leyingoti
